name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gerald JONES, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Judgment of Sentence is Affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph C. Santaguida, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1211
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gerald JONES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 19, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Joseph C. Santaguida, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Richard McMonigle, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
